segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen, and it's quite a sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult woman at the sink is completely engrossed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's carefully drying a plate, her gaze fixed on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink, oh the sink, it's a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is running freely, overflowing the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It cascades down the cabinet doors and forms a growing puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is right in the middle of it, yet she doesn't seem to notice at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so utterly unaware of their immediate surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's astonishing how calm her expression remains despite the spreading flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really worry about the amount of water damage this will cause.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden visible through the window highlights the internal chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation makes me feel a bit on edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She needs to look down, just for a second.
segments.speaker: PAR
